issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: The files `arrow/ci/conda_env_*.yml` files are not yaml files, we should rename them to use txt extension.
fields.summary: [CI] The conda environment files arrow/ci/conda_env_*.yml should have .txt extension

comments.body: [~kszucs] do you want to tackle this?
Should we try to fix this? Shouldn't be too difficult
